q1: I really love the team Italy
a1: Italy is a fun team to watch.
a2: Italy is a well-organized team. They don't concede a lot of goals.
q3: Can Italy's manager get them to the world cup?
a3: Yes, if he has strong players.

a5: Do you know any defenders on their team?
